document.full_text: dramatic population shifts over the past decade made the south the nation's fastest growing region for the first time, elbowing out the west, u.s. census bureau officials said on thursday.
document.title: south rises again, leading u.s. in population growth
lines_and_colors: dramatic population shifts over the past decade made the south the nation's fastest growing region for the first time, elbowing out the west, u.s. census bureau officials said on thursday.
